phase1_foundation.name: Foundation
phase1_foundation.goal: Working 3D todo app with dark void scene, crystalline task cards, CRUD operations, and unit-tested store

phase2_core-visual.name: Core Visual
phase2_core-visual.goal: Cinematic GSAP animations for all CRUD operations, 2000-particle ambient system with mouse attraction and event bursts, localStorage persistence with staggered entrance

phase3_enhancement.name: Enhancement
phase3_enhancement.goal: Filter UI with animated scene reorganization, raycaster hover/click/3D drag-drop interaction, EffectComposer with bloom/chromatic aberration/vignette and auto-disable FPS guard

phase4_polish.name: Polish
phase4_polish.goal: 3D progress ring tracking completion ratio with color interpolation, completion pulse animations, and victory particle cascade + ring shatter sequence

phase5_verification.name: Verification
phase5_verification.goal: Production-ready: 60 FPS audit, rapid interaction stress tests, bundle optimization under 600KB, cross-browser smoke test, keyboard accessibility
